topics.body:
"@igotnopicks":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553b0422636872088d023300#post_553b0422636872088d023300
Guess what? I "got it" the first time, and I didn't need to rewatch FLCL. All I needed to do was surrender myself to the madness, and I enjoyed every moment of watching it.

FLCL does seem pretty much like a really bizzare metaphor for growing up. And I do think it's pretty much like Seinfeld - _a show about nothing_. That is, if you could make such a comparison. The point is that FLCL is unconventional as hell, and you are a fool thinking you can just get it. Even I still don't get it somewhat, but I don't care, because I just had fun going insane watching it!

Don't watch FLCL to just "get it". Watch FLCL for FLCL.
